column4: hello. My laptop has a touchpad. Can i use that with fprint-demo?
libfprint is for finger print scanners (e.g. thinkpads). not for touchpads. a touchpad is mouse. it doesn't detect fingerprints
you need something like this: http://www.pc.ibm.com/de/lenovo/pressephotos/imgs/produkte/thinkpad/finger_print_reader/tn_thinkpad_t42_fingerprint.jpg  and even there, not all models are supported
